instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00239 no power, no image
threads.message:
Good afternoon, this mac presented image only with the battery disconnected, I analyzed and identified oxidation in the region of UB300, U3100 and the track PP3V3_UPC_TA_LDO that goes to RB310 was broken, I changed the UB300 and made track again, in the tests the mac does not present image and without activity in the USB, the CPU heats up a lot. 
    I tried another Bios that I found in the badcaps forum, but it didn't work.


Voltage: PPBUS_G3H 13.08v; PP3V3_G3H 3.419V; PP3V3_UPC_XB_LDO 3.3v; PP1V8_UPC_XB_LDOD 1.8v; PP1V1_UPC_XB_LDO_BMC 0v;

Follows the BIOS backup.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1vqFsoQ-aG7MdMEdgU2WgYRbuxU77-lzT/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

threads.title: 820-00239 no power, no image
threads.message: So now you lost the image, even if battery is disconnected?

threads.title: 820-00239 no power, no image
threads.message:
Re-check your job.
Do you get voltage on CPU coils now?

threads.title: 820-00239 no power, no image
threads.message: 0V, but the CPU heats up a lot.
